root: ^Your character enters the room with your new found armor.
^‘Here comes a wild demon ! What do you want to do ?’

balrog_attack: ^‘You slay the demon with a dashing strike of your shiny sword, and find out once it’s dead that it was busy gardening.’
^‘The path is now free to walk past the corpse of the peaceful balrog.’
balrog_distract: ^‘You throw a relic you got in an old dungeon, in the direction opposite to you, which effectively distracts the demon.’
^‘And the path is free to walk past the demon.’
